item.title: CDO Confessions Part 1: Cracking The Role Code
item.description: The Chief Digital Officer role sounds glamorous, where business meets tech and magic happens. But in reality? It’s a balancing act between transformation dreams, political landmines, and endless firefighting. This blog slices through the hype with stories, frameworks, and a wink of humor to help you survive (and maybe even thrive) in the CDO hot seat.
